lessons.japanese: 靴下を裏返しにはいてるよ。
lessons.english: You are wearing your socks inside out.

lessons.japanese: 間違えて手袋を裏返しにはめてしまった。
lessons.english: I put my gloves on inside out by mistake.

lessons.japanese: 右の靴下が裏返しだよ。
lessons.english: You have your right sock on wrong side out.

lessons.japanese: レコードが終わった。裏返しにしてくれ。
lessons.english: The record is finished. Turn it over.

lessons.japanese: セーターを裏返しにきているじゃないか。
lessons.english: You're wearing your sweater inside out.

lessons.japanese: セーターが裏返しだよ。
lessons.english: You're wearing your sweater inside out.

lessons.japanese: ジョンはセーターを裏返しに着ていた。
lessons.english: John had put his sweater on inside out.

lessons.japanese: ここへ来る途中、風が強すぎて僕の傘は裏返しになってしまった。
lessons.english: On my way here, the strong wind blew my umbrella inside out.

lessons.japanese: ケンはシャツを裏返しに着ていた。
lessons.english: Ken put his shirt on inside out.

lessons.japanese: 彼は肌着を裏返しに着た。
lessons.english: He put on his undershirt inside out.

lessons.japanese: 彼は靴下を裏返しに履いていた。
lessons.english: He had his socks on inside out.

lessons.japanese: 彼は靴下の片方を裏返しにはいていた。
lessons.english: He had one of his socks on inside out.

lessons.japanese: 彼はセーターを裏返しに着た。
lessons.english: He put on his sweater wrong side out.

lessons.japanese: 彼はシャツを裏返しに着ていた。
lessons.english: He had his shirt on inside out.
